code:
stateDiagram state "This is a state description of HR600 Workflow" as s2 [Security_Encryption] --> Login Login --> if_backupData if_backupData --> StartWorkflow: false if_backupData --> is_networkAvailable : true is_networkAvailable --> BackupToNetwork: true Note right of BackupToNetwork: There is still unsaved production data in the backup directory.
Do you want to transfer the data to the network drive now? is_networkAvailable --> RemainingBackup: false Note right of RemainingBackup: There is production data in the backup directory that has not yet been backed up.
The network drive for backing up the data is not available.
The data cannot be transferred. StartWorkflow --> FinishWorkflow FinishWorkflow --> [Security_Encryption] StartWorkflow --> MesDataToNetwork MesDataToNetwork --> StartWorkflow MesDataToNetwork --> Crash Note right of Crash: The transfer of the packed production data export file failed.
The data will be saved to a local backup directory.
Please make sure that the network drive is available and access is granted.
You can move the cached data to the network drive again the next time you start HRSoft2. Note right of Crash: The backup of the packed production data export file to the backup directory failed.
Please make sure that the backup directory is available and access is granted.
You may find the production data unpacked on the temporary directory TempArchiveFiles.
You can also initiate a manual export from the HRSoft2 archives.
If the problem persists, please contact Ersa service. Note right of Crash: An error occurred while generating the zip file of the production data.
The generation of the production data is aborted.
You can continue the process normally until the end.
You can perform a manual file-based data backup to a network drive
by performing an export in the archive in the archive entry just generated.
If this problem persists, please contact Ersa Service. Note left of Crash: An error occurred while generating the CSV data.
The generation of the production data is aborted.
You can continue the process normally until the end.
You can perform a manual file-based data backup to a network drive
by performing an export in the archive in the archive entry just created.
If this problem persists, please contact Ersa Service. Note left of Crash: An error occurred while querying the database for the last entry.
The generation of the production data is aborted.
You can continue the process normally until the end.
You can perform a manual file-based data backup to a network drive
by performing an export in the archive in the archive entry just generated.
If this problem persists, please contact Ersa Service. MesDataToNetwork --> FinishWorkflow [Security_Firewall] Crash --> FinishWorkflow Crash --> Backup [Security_IntrusionDetection]

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Security_Encryption 和 Security_Firewall 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Security_Encryption 和 Security_Firewall'，你看看合适吗？
